title: The Power Of Time
text:
There are three main ingredients in investing:
From the most simplistic point of view, we have the classic formula of compounding interest (future value):
\[
FV = P \times (1 + r)^n
\]

title: Financial Lab
text:
This is an experimental website to explore various data visualizations and computational results published/shared in Personal Finance media.
The idea is to help and guide students in their attempts to replicate, reverse engineer, expand, and critique visualizations, claims and results found across personal finance media outlets.

title: About
text: Data Analysis on Personal Finance Topics

title: The Power Of Time
text:
Start Early and Save Often

Savings per Month to be a millionaire at 65
Assumed rate of return is 10% at age 20, decreasing 0.1% each year, reaching a terminal return of 5.5% at age 65.

title: The Power Of Time
text:
The Power of Starting Young

Savings per Month to be a millionaire at 65
Assumptions:

10% return in 20s
9% return in 30s
8% return in 40s
7% return in 50s
6% return after 60s

title: The Power Of Time
text:
The Power of Time

What investing $500/month over different lengths of time turns into.

title: The Power Of Time
text:
Wealth Multiplier

Expected lifetime return for ages 0 to 20 is 10% per year, decreasing by 0.1% each year after 20, reaching a 5.5% terminal return at 65.
